title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast - Jan 31 2020
itunes:title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast - Jan 31 2020
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1:

Democrats dirty up the acquittal. Chiefs' Frank Clark wears Trump/Kanye hoodie to Super Bowl presser. Bolton defends bureaucrats against the voters. NYT drops last-minute bombshell from Bolton. E. Jean Carroll demands Trump DNA. Rudy denies NYT bombshell. MSNBC commentator says Trump will stop voting in California, overthrow democratic system. Mini-election night: montage of upset media at prospect of Trump acquittal. Tony Romo to ESPN? Cowboys should franchise tag Dak Prescott. CNN begs John Bolton to call in.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2:

CNN says Trump’s coronavirus taskforce is too white. Rush proven right: Democrats didn’t really want witnesses. CNN host doesn’t understand why Trump approval has risen. Caller thinks we need more congressmen. Murkowski says she’ll vote no on witnesses. F. Chuck Todd: If you’re popular, you can bulldoze the Constitution. So, Trump’s popular, Chuck? Will the GOP remain Trump’s party after Trump? What would Rush miss most if he had to start over?

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3:

House managers focusing closing argument on NYT Bolton story, had to be tipped off early. Schiff refuses to answer questions about Eric Ciaramella, Sean Misko. Schiff makes up more stories, conversations between Trump and Putin, Rudy and the ChiComs. GOP is now a solid pro-life party. Dems delay acquittal vote to next week? Brennan says cancel SOTU.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
